name: Baby Shark 8BIT
description:
Baby Shark 8BIT is an arcade game where Baby Shark find various underwater friends while avoiding obstacles in the sea. Meet various friends in the sea, and fill your own sea with friends!

Features:

# Easy to play the game.

Tap the screen to help Baby Shark swim. Avoid the obstacles and get stars!

# Find and invite various underwater friends.

Find a variety of underwater friends, such as sea turtles and shellfish, tropical fish and sea urchins, and make friends with Baby Shark.

# Achieve higher records.

Make a record in TOP 5. Prove you are the best!

#Provides low difficulty settings for kids

You can choose a lower difficulty level for your child. (Press the blue Baby Shark button in the game!)

Notice
- This game includes advertisements from third parties. Please see our Privacy Policy for more information.
- This game is free to play; however, some in-game items can be purchased with real money.
